title: No KSV icon in the store for me

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: For some reason KSV is missing and i looked threw all the icons and cannot seem to find KSV did it get removed was is put on hold what?

replies.body: There's a good chance it might have left the store already or just not added quite yet, I'm not actually seeing it in my store either right now.

Hi, 

I had the very same question because I wasn't able to found the KSV Icon, I looked for info regarding that (actually that's how I got here) and found this [2018 Spring Split Icons | Lolesports](https://eu.lolesports.com/en/articles/2018-spring-split-icons)  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
